001package gust.backend.model;
002
003
004import com.google.protobuf.Message;
005import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
006import javax.annotation.concurrent.Immutable;
007import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe;
008import java.util.Map;
009
010
011/**
012 * Specifies a serializer which is capable of converting {@link Message} instances into generic Java {@link Map} objects
013 * with regular {@link String} keys. If there are nested records on the model instance, they will be serialized into
014 * recursive {@link Map} instances.
015 *
016 * @param <Model> Model record type which this serializer is responsible for converting.
017 */
018@Immutable
019@ThreadSafe
020public final class ObjectModelSerializer<Model extends Message> implements ModelSerializer<Model, Map<String, ?>> {
021  /**
022   * Serialize a model instance from the provided object type to a generic Java {@link Map}, throwing exceptions
023   * verbosely if we are unable to correctly, verifiably, and properly export the record.
024   *
025   * <p>Records serialized in this manner are immutable.</p>
026   *
027   * @param input Input record object to serialize.
028   * @return Serialized record data, of the specified output type.
029   * @throws ModelDeflateException If the model fails to export or serialize for any reason.
030   */
031  @Nonnull
032  @Override
033  public Map<String, ?> deflate(@Nonnull Model input) throws ModelDeflateException {
034    return null;
035  }
036}
